## Quaternion.Angle() method

Returns the angle in degrees between two rotations a and b.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Angle(quat1: ReadOnlyQuaternion, quat2: ReadOnlyQuaternion): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  quat1 | <code>ReadOnlyQuaternion</code> | defines the first quaternion |
|  quat2 | <code>ReadOnlyQuaternion</code> | defines the second quaternion |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`
